sentences.en: 30 families are suffering 'cause they're out of work.
sentences.cn: 有30户人家因为失业而正在经受煎熬。

sentences.en: He decided Franklin must be suffering from a bad cold.
sentences.cn: 他断定富兰克林一定是得了重感冒。

sentences.en: He remained in a critical condition after suffering heart failure.
sentences.cn: 他发生心力衰竭后病情一直危重。

sentences.en: He was eventually diagnosed as suffering from terminal cancer.
sentences.cn: 他最终被诊断出患了晚期癌症。

sentences.en: He was suffering from shock as well as the after-effects of drugs.
sentences.cn: 他在受着毒品毒副作用影响的同时还出现了休克。

sentences.en: His trial revived memories of French suffering during the war.
sentences.cn: 他的受审重新勾起了在战争中受苦受难的法国人民的回忆。

sentences.en: I have recently been suffering from pain and numbness in my hands.
sentences.cn: 我近来双手一直疼痛麻木。

sentences.en: I think Tessa should plump for Malcolm, her long-suffering admirer.
sentences.cn: 我想特莎应该选择长期默默爱慕她的马尔科姆。

sentences.en: In some stores we were undermanned and customer service was suffering.
sentences.cn: 有些店我们人手不足，对顾客照顾不周。

sentences.en: Larry began suffering severe headaches and violent mood swings.
sentences.cn: 拉里开始出现严重的头痛和剧烈的情绪波动。

sentences.en: She was fitted with a pacemaker after suffering serious heart trouble.
sentences.cn: 她患上严重的心脏病后安装了心脏起搏器。

sentences.en: She was taken to hospital suffering from an irregular heartbeat.
sentences.cn: 她因心律不齐被送往医院。

sentences.en: The boy was suffering from a bowel obstruction and he died.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩因患肠梗阻死去了。

sentences.en: They escaped the blaze but were rushed to hospital suffering from shock.
sentences.cn: 他们逃离了火海，却因休克而被迅速送往医院。

sentences.en: They were taken to hospital suffering from smoke inhalation.
sentences.cn: 他们因吸入大量烟尘被送往医院。
